titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Burning Water Archive
ca.1962-1968
MSS.007
titlestmt.author: Processed by Tania Friedel, April 1999

editionstmt.p: This version was derived from burningwater.html

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-01-05 11:18:39 -0500.

did.abstract: The Burning Water Archive is a collection of correspondence to the editors, Edward Kissam and Paul Boorstin, and issues 1-5 of the journal.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: The Burning Water Archive was acquired in 1969.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p:
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); The Burning Water Archive; MSS 7; [box number]; [folder number], Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Burning Water Archive is a collection of correspondence to the editors, Edward Kissam and Paul Boorstin, from 1962 to 1968. Collection highlights include letters written by Carol Bergé, Robert Bly, Ted Enslin, Clayton Eschleman, and Gary Snyder.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The correspondence in the collection is arranged alphabetically. The issues of the journal are organized chronologically.

list.head: Missing Title
list.item: Series I: Correspondence and Issues of Burning Water

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: There is no information about materials that are associated by provenance to the described materials that have been physically separated or removed.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

did.unittitle: Series I: Correspondence and Issues of Burning Water

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Series 1 contains one box of correspondence to the editors, Edward Kissam and Paul Boorstin between 1962-1968. Noted correspondents include Carol Bergé, Robert Bly, Ted Enslin, Clayton Eschleman, and Gary Snyder. Series 1 also contains issues 1-5 of Burning Water.
